attributes.action: Shave the eyebrows of Angus Johnstone, for one day they will surely engulf the planet like an eyebrow rainforest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Angus's eyebrows must be stopped, for many fear that they will soon extend into the atmosphere. It has already been proved that they are the main factor behind global warming.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
